page.title: 06The Pram Race
page.content: One of the most well-known events in these parts is the pram race held every Good Friday Morning. This event began 20 years ago and helps to raise money for local charities .This year the beneficiary was the Young Disabled Unit in Preston. Over 30 two-man teams take part in the race which covers a 4 km course from the Walmer Bridge Inn to the Longton Arms and back again. At each pub on the way both pusher and passenger,usually in fancy dress, must drink a pint of bitter beer. Apart from prizes for the overall race winners there is a prize for Best-Dressed pram and also a Ladies' race . The event is now organised by the Round Table. (Craig Bamber,Christine Higham)
